name: cord crossbow reload mechanism
description: A small clip and a long string designed to attach to the back of a crossbow, letting you draw the string back more easily.  Takes a bit longer to use though.

name: lever crossbow reload mechanism
description: A steel lever mechanism for a crossbow, letting you draw the string back more easily.  For larger siege crossbows.  Takes a bit longer to use though.

name: windlass crossbow reload mechanism
description: A simple rope and pulley windlass mechanism for a crossbow, letting you draw the string back very easily.  Usually for larger siege crossbows.  Takes a lot longer to use though.

name: electric crossbow reload mechanism
description: A electric motor mechanism for a crossbow, which draws the string back very quickly.
